objects.description: [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) has inserted malicious macros into existing documents, providing persistence when they are reopened. [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) has loaded the group's previously delivered VBA project by relaunching Microsoft Outlook with the /altvba option, once the Application.Startup event is received.(Citation: ESET Gamaredon June 2020)

external_references.description: Boutin, J. (2020, June 11). Gamaredon group grows its game. Retrieved June 16, 2020.
